response.overview: Wooyeol and Nara, who usually enjoy sex, drink alcohol and sleep at Nara's house. Kang-hyeon, a wealthy father, brings his girlfriend Ha-yeon into her house to have sex. Ha-yeon runs into her superiority at her house, and Ha-yeon, who has experience having sex with her superiority, is surprised and takes her superiority away. She tells Ha-yeon that she wants Woo-yeol to keep her secret that she met her, and Woo-yeol asks her to have sex instead of keeping her secret.
response.title: Dad's Girlfriend
